-spec minimum_array_length([integer()]) -> integer().
minimum_array_length(Nums) ->
    if
        gcd_list(Nums) =:= 1 -> 1;
        true -> 2
    end.

gcd_list([H|T]) ->
    lists:foldl(fun(X, Acc) -> gcd(X, Acc) end, H, T).

gcd(A, 0) -> A;
gcd(A, B) -> gcd(B, A rem B).
